[Whispering Staff](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2146)
</title>

<traits>

<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 105 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 70,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This gnarled wooden staff is carved with humanoid faces in various emotional states. When the staff is activated, the faces begin to whisper a variety of languages in sibilant tones, creating what seems to be nonsense to all but the staff's wielder or those they choose to affect. The staff functions as a [_major staff of divination_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=353). While using the staff, you gain a +3 item bonus to [Decipher Writing](/Actions.aspx?ID=22), [Identify Magic](/Actions.aspx?ID=24), and [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) checks, regardless of the skill. When you invest the staff, you either increase your Intelligence score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever is higher. You must select the skills and languages the first time you invest the item, and whenever you invest the same _whispering staff_, you get the same skills and languages you chose the first time.
